storyInfo: Setting the story aside, Muelsyse offers Mayer an olive branch. Back in the story, Anthony offers an olive branch of his own to Robin.

attributes.content: After that, it should be Robin's...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Before we get there, Ms. Mayer.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: There's something else I want to ask you.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: What's up? I don't know nearly as much as Silence.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Not a problem. This is something you know just as well as she does.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: What do you think of the whole 'Diαbolic Crisis?'
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If I'm not mistaken, you were part of that project, weren't you?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Eh, don't have a clue.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: We Engineering folks usually just hand out the equipment, maybe give some professional advice when the equipment gets made. We don't usually try to figure out what the experiment is all about.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I just know how it turned out in the end. Silence brought Ifrit with her to Rhodes Island, a place she barely had a working relationship with.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: After that, Saria ended up taking responsibility for everything that happened and left Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: If you're trying to learn about what went down there, you're asking the wrong girl.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: No, it's not the incident itself that I wanted to know more about. I mean, incidents like that one are a dime a dozen at Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm, so why are you asking?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I'm asking because I want to know, from your perspective, what kind of a person do you think Silence is? And how about Saria?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm, I think Silence's a pretty serious girl. Honestly, I've always felt that's the way all researchers should be.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You're right. She's very smart. She's very perceptive, too. Plus, she's had more than a few successful projects under her belt.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: From what I heard, the Structural Director's hoping to prime Silence to take over.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Wow, you mean Silence's gonna be calling the shots at Structural? That's so cool!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Yeah, even I wanna butter her up now~
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As for Saria, I don't actually know her that well.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I mean, Defense isn't like the other departments. I hardly ever saw her in Rhodes Island, let alone talked to her.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: But the biggest impression I have of her is she's really cautious, going from what I know about the 'Diαbolic Crisis.'
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I mean, she was the one who hit the brakes on the whole project. She even took the blame for everything and quit, even though experiments going wrong isn't actually that uncommon there.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: There were rumors among my coworkers that the 'Diαbolic Crisis' was some kinda conspiracy. I don't know that much about that stuff, though.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Besides, Ifrit's having a great time at Rhodes Island all around, so I guess it wasn't a big deal.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Hm? So the test subject is doing well at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Yep, like she's always on top of the whole world.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Oh, and here I thought... Well, gotta hand it to them, then. Rhodes Island sounds like a pretty impressive company.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But well, there's one thing I can tell you. Saria didn't leave Rhine Lab just because of the 'Diαbolic Crisis.' It's just one of a whole string of events that led to it, and there's more to it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It might have been the straw that broke the burdenbeast's back, though.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The primary reason was that she had a beef with Control.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Huh? Control?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That's right. Saria and Control actually got along okay at first, you know?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But, like you said, Saria was way too cautious. She thinks all scientific research should be contained.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's not how Control saw it, though. There would've been no Rhine Lab if she did.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: How should I say this? Let's try an analogy.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Let's say we have a line. Saria's line.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Rhine Lab's always done things above board. They've come close to crossing the line, but they've never actually done it, so Saria never said anything.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But that whole string of events, the 'Diαbolic Crisis' included, meant that someone was trying to cross that line. They might even have crossed it already.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Saria wouldn't have that.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But Control didn't care.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Why's that?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Ms. Mayer, tell me. Do you actually care about the whole thing with Anthony that Ms. Silence and I were talking about at all?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm... Well, now that I know more about what happened to him, I guess it's not a bad thing that he got out. Something like that, I guess?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You see? You're honest and kind, but you couldn't care less. You care more about your research, your 'Mibo.'
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I've gotta hand it to you, though. Mibo's a really great design. Mind if I touch it?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Sure thing, have at it.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Aha, so cute.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You were working on your designs too just now, right?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Yep, I got a couple new ideas. I'm gonna try them out as soon as we're back at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Hehe, see, Control's like this too.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: She can see very far ahead of her. Sometimes, I get the feeling that not even the sky above can keep her from seeing beyond it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: There probably isn't a single person in the world who knows just where it is she set her sights. Even I only have a vague idea of what's going on in her mind.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Eh, I've only ever caught a glimpse of her when she's giving speeches. Never knew she'd be like that too.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That's right. There are lots of things that she just doesn't care about. To her, as long as her research isn't being blocked, that line might as well not exist.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That drove a wedge between her and Saria.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But why are you telling me all this? Shouldn't you be talking to Silence?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I'm not sure what I'd do with this information.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I'm telling you this because you don't know.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I figured that you two probably could've gotten along, so I wanted you to get a better idea of the kind of person she is.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Besides, I actually want to be friends with you myself. I like researchers like you, so pure.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If I'm not mistaken, you voluntarily signed up for Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Yeah, I wanted a change of atmosphere.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Mind telling me why?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm... I guess there wasn't really much of a reason.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Alright. If you ever come back to Rhine Lab, though, you should think about transferring to our department.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm, I'll give it some thought.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Don't worry. We've got time.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Alright, why don't we get back to that story?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You... sure about this?
Yeah, I want to... try.
Mm...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Well, hello there.
Where am I...?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: This here's my room, and it's also the prison clinic.
I know who you are...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I know who you are too... The name's Domma.
What am I doing here...?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Right, there was a fight, and I got dragged into the mess...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: You passed out, Ms. Robin.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anthony...?!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: How come you know my name?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Domma has a list of prisoners here.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You're a hitman too, aren't you?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Domma found this weapon on you, and you were there. I could only arrive at this conclusion.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Of course, if you really aren't, you are free to prove me wrong.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Regardless of whether that is truly the case, I hope you could at least listen to what I have to say. Everything I'll be telling you is under the assumption that you came here to kill me. I mean no offense, and I hope you don't get the wrong impression.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I know who sent you here. They are the ones who orchestrated my family's downfall. They are also behind my imprisonment here for the past six years.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: And I've made my decision to break out of this prison to get to the end of it.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I can tell your combat prowess is superb, and I'm hoping you'd be willing to abandon your contract as a hitman and come help me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: It's as simple as that.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You don't need to give me an answer right away.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I need a lot of time to prepare. You have a lot of time on your hands as well.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: If you want to kill me, you are free to keep trying. You could also give up.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: If you are interested in helping me, just pay the clinic a visit and let Domma know.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Mr. Anthony, Captain Barton was wondering if you are doing okay. Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Nothing serious; just a few scrapes. Let him know to wait a little longer. I'll be finished here soon.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Right, not a problem. Take your time.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: I need to deal with Barton.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You should head back and think this offer through, Ms. Robin.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Heh, I thought Anthony was just some simple, kind-hearted guy, but it sounds like I'm not giving him enough credit.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm? What makes you say that?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: We know for sure that Robin was there to kill him, but he didn't have any concrete proof. Yet he still made her that offer.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Really? I thought that was pretty reckless of him.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: If Robin wasn't there to kill him, and she tipped him off to the jailers, what happens then?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Hehe, that's the part that I like about him.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Think about it. You're a fresh fish. No one knows who you are. Meanwhile, Anthony's built a reputation, a prestige for himself over the years.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Whose words do you think carry more weight?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Let's take a step back. Say Barton and the guards there really believed her. Could they have done anything about that?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: They couldn't have acted on that information.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Well, now that you mention it, I guess there wasn't much they could've done even if she ratted him out.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Hehe, you think it's reckless, and you'd be right under normal circumstances. It's a risky move if he didn't have his 'prestige,' or perhaps 'influence' is the better word to use here.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But what I think is really interesting is that—Those who know how to build prestige for themselves don't usually do something like that.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hmm, and why's that?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That's because what he said was also a threat. He was telling her, 'You could tell him, but it's not going to do you any good.'
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: When you hear that, it doesn't really sound like something that someone who's really got prestige would say, right?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Heh, you're right. It does sound like a threat.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That's what I mean. Besides, did Anthony ever say anything about what he did to appease Barton?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm? Oh... he said he volunteered to be put in solitary for half a month.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Everyone knew that he wasn't the one at fault, but he chose to be punished to get this thing behind them, huh...?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I can almost imagine that grin on Barton's face when Anthony told him he was willing to accept punishment.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But he still held back.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Tsk tsk, such a hard guy to deal with.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I think he probably just figured Robin wouldn't rat him out.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Hm... it's possible. I won't deny it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: By the way, Ms. Silence is really taking her time, isn't she?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Yeah, you're right. I'll go take a look.
attributes.name: Mayer
